2025-03-03.title: Quectel Unveils Its New Smart Module SC200V at MWC 2025, Unlocking New Possibilities for High-Performance and Advanced Multi-Media Smart Devices
2025-03-03.description: BARCELONA, Spain — Quectel Wireless Solutions, a global IoT solutions provider, today announces the launch of the SC200V smart module, powered by a Qualcomm Technologies processor. Designed to deliver exceptional performance across system capabilities, multim…
